commands.name: az iot ops schema registry create
commands.syntax:
az iot ops schema registry create --name
                                  --registry-namespace
                                  --resource-group
                                  --sa-resource-id
                                  [--custom-role-id]
                                  [--desc]
                                  [--display-name]
                                  [--location]
                                  [--sa-container]
                                  [--tags]
examples: az iot ops schema registry create -n myregistry -g myresourcegroup --registry-namespace myschemas --sa-resource-id $STORAGE_ACCOUNT_RESOURCE_ID

az iot ops schema registry create -n myregistry -g myresourcegroup --registry-namespace myschemas --sa-resource-id $STORAGE_ACCOUNT_RESOURCE_ID --sa-container myschemacontainer -l westus2 --desc 'Contoso factory X1 schemas' --display-name 'Contoso X1' --tags env=prod

commands.name: az iot ops schema registry delete
commands.syntax:
az iot ops schema registry delete --name
                                  [--resource-group]
                                  [--yes {false, true}]
examples: az iot ops schema registry delete -n myregistry -g myresourcegroup

commands.name: az iot ops schema registry list
commands.summary: List schema registries in a resource group or subscription.
commands.syntax: az iot ops schema registry list [--resource-group]
examples: az iot ops schema registry list -g myresourcegroup
az iot ops schema registry list --query "[?tags.env == 'prod']"

commands.name: az iot ops schema registry show
commands.summary: Show details of a schema registry.
commands.syntax:
az iot ops schema registry show --name
                                --resource-group
examples: az iot ops schema registry show --name myregistry -g myresourcegroup
